about_the_game:
The content is 137 awesome avatars, redeemed through badges earned in the game.

They come from 30 characters, humans, robots, beasts, monsters and more.



This DLC requires 16 GB of disk space
Whether downloaded or not does not affect the collection of badges in the game
detailed_description:
The content is 137 awesome avatars, redeemed through badges earned in the game.

They come from 30 characters, humans, robots, beasts, monsters and more.



This DLC requires 16 GB of disk space
Whether downloaded or not does not affect the collection of badges in the game
name: Saber Ship - Collection Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Same as the base game
  • Processor: Same as the base game
  • Graphics: Same as the base game
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • VR Support: Same as the base game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Same as the base game
  • Processor: Same as the base game
  • Graphics: Same as the base game
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • VR Support: Same as the base game

short_description: This is an expansion pack for Saber Ship that includes collectible content for avatar type.
